00045 //----------------------------------------------------------
00047 tstring
00048 UTF16toUTF8( UINT_PTR utf16 )
00049 {
00051         unsigned long uniChar = 0;
00052         unsigned short lowWord = (unsigned short)( utf16 & 0xFFFF );
00053         if ( lowWord < 0xD800 || lowWord > 0xDFFF )
00054         {
00055                 uniChar = lowWord;
00056         }
00057         else
00058         {
00059                 unsigned short highWord = (unsigned short)( ( utf16 & 0xFFFF0000 ) >> 16 );
00060                 B_ASSERT( lowWord >= 0xD800 && lowWord <= 0xDBFF );
00061                 B_ASSERT( highWord >= 0xDC00 && highWord <= 0xDFFF );
00062                 uniChar = ( ( lowWord & 0x3FF ) | ( ( highWord & 0x3FF ) << 10 ) );
00063         }
00064 
00066         B_ASSERT( uniChar < 65536 );
00067 
00069         return UnicodeToUTF8( ( unsigned short )( uniChar & 0xFFFF ) );
00070 }
00071 
00072 //----------------------------------------------------------
00074 tstring
00075 UnicodeToUTF8( unsigned short uniChar )
00076 {
00077         tstring str;
00078         if ( uniChar >= 0x800 )
00079         {
00081                 char byte0 = 0xE0 | ( ( uniChar & 0xF000 ) >> 12 );
00082                 char byte1 = 0x80 | ( ( uniChar & 0x0FC0 ) >> 6 );
00083                 char byte2 = 0x80 | ( uniChar & 0x003F );
00084                 str += byte0;
00085                 str += byte1;
00086                 str += byte2;
00087         }
00088         else if ( uniChar >= 0x80 )
00089         {
00091                 char byte0 = 0xC0 | ( ( uniChar & 0x07C0 ) >> 6 );
00092                 char byte1 = 0x80 | ( ( uniChar & 0x3F ) );
00093                 str += byte0;
00094                 str += byte1;
00095         }
00096         else
00097         {
00099                 char byte0 = ( char )uniChar;
00100                 str += byte0;
00101         }
00102         return str;
00103 }
00104 
00105 //----------------------------------------------------------
00107 extern tstring AsciiToUTF8( unsigned char ch )
00108 {
00109         tstring str;
00110         if ( ch >= 0x80 )
00111         {
00113                 char byte0 = 0xC0 | ( ( ch & 0x07C0 ) >> 6 );
00114                 char byte1 = 0x80 | ( ( ch & 0x3F ) );
00115                 str += byte0;
00116                 str += byte1;
00117         }
00118         else
00119         {
00121                 char byte0 = ( char )ch;
00122                 str += byte0;
00123         }
00124         return str;
00125 }
00126 
00127 //----------------------------------------------------------
00129 extern tstring AsciiToUTF8( tstring str )
00130 {
00132         tstring outStr;
00133         size_t len = str.length();
00134         for ( size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i )
00135         {
00136                 outStr += AsciiToUTF8( ( unsigned char )str.c_str()[ i ] );
00137         }
00138         return outStr;
00139 }
